text: The United States Secretary of Housing and Urban Development is the head of the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development, concerned with urban housing matters. The Secretary is a member of the President's Cabinet. On January 13, 1966, Robert C. Weaver became the first African American Cabinet member by being appointed to the position. == Chronological list == ;Parties (9) (9) ; Status No. Portrait Name State of residence Took office Left office President(s) Robert C.
